subject: College Athletics
Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Big East has quelled the drumbeat of criticism, thanks mainly to the stellar play of its two undefeated teams: No. 8 Cincinnati and No. 23 South Florida.
snippet: The Big East has quelled the drumbeat of criticism, thanks mainly to the stellar play of its two undefeated teams: No. 8 Cincinnati and No. 23 South Florida.
